author: @goldendust3562
text: I was a wannable before. After they disbanded I quit k-pop because there is no group that catch my heart. One day, my friend suggested me to look up for seventeen. Ngl, I was kinda interested in them but I wasn't ready to join another fandom (the disband of w1 give me so much PAIN). But today, I think I'm ready to join carat. I completely fell in love with svt and all of the members, their song, choreography, literally EVERYTHING. It took me almost 4 years to move on, I'm afraid that it's going to be too late to join the fandom now but well.. here I am

author: @mogmog_ojjl
text:
영상과 상관없는 글이지만 확인과 연대 부탁드립니다.

11월 2일에 올라온 낙태죄 완전폐지의 청와대 청원입니다. 여성의 몸을 여성 스스로 결정할 수 있게 아직 태어나지도 못한 생명보다 살아있는 지금의 여성을 위해 청원 동의 부탁드립니다. 네이버 페북 트위터 카카오 총 4개의 아이디로 청원 동의 가능합니다. 청원 동의로 연대 부탁드립니다.

https://www1.president.go.kr/petitions/593745
(~12월 2일까지)
#여자가_먼저다 
#법이_규정하는_생명에_여자는_없다 
#내_결정은_죄가_아니다 
#낙태죄완전폐지

웹툰 법적 규제와 관련하여 청와대에 건의하였습니다. 현재 웹툰 산업이 자발적 자율규제로 운영되며 혐오적 표현들이 너무나 당연하게 여성인권 위에 서 있기에 우리는 이를 바꾸고자 합니다. 청원 동의로 연대 부탁드립니다.

https://www1.president.go.kr/petitions/Temp/uZkapM
(~12월 6일까지)
#웹툰계는_여성인권을_무시하지_말라

But then i listen and keep listening again, and then i'm really ashamed as a carat. How could i dislike such a soft, meaningful song? Even the dance is so playful, soft and lovely. I feel like i've failed Seventeen for not being thankful enough. I'm sorry :( but now i really love the song, and can't stop watching the dance practice over and over again as it's so amazing, as any other Seventeen's dance practice videos.

text:
*ATTENTION CARATs!!!*

*LEFT & RIGHT MASS V0TING AND STR17MING PROJECT.*

We need to mass str17m and vote. We need to hit 45M in order to give our SEVENTEEN more wins. We are called CARATs for a reason, we make our SEVENTEEN shine.

●v0te for Seventeen on idolchamp.
*-Please use multiple devices if you have, we are losing currently.*

●please mass str17m we need to hit 45M today.
*-Use multiple accounts to str17m, I also heard it's better to use YouTube premium while you str17m. When you comment/interact with the video censor words like "str17m" "str17ming" "vie₩s" "vie₩" "v0te" "v0tes" "v0ting" do not use em0jis, do not use links and do not use hashtags. Make sure you're logged in onto your account. Search for "left & right" on Youtube and then watch the video without pausing, rewinding or fast forwarding. Also, make sure to watch it on normal speed and 480p-720p quality. Make sure the volume is 50+.Do not use the replay button. Make sure your watch and search history is not on pause also do not clear your watch and search history. Do not watch the music video continuously, YouTube might consider you as a bot if you watch the mv continuously with the same account so take breaks for 10 minutes and in between those 10 minutes watch other videos on YouTube. Come back yo str17ming after 10 minutes.*

Please spread this on your social media accounts, make more CARATs join this mass v0ting and str17ming project.

Reminder-there are "baby carats" who ask how to vote, they're NOT CARATs. They're people from our competitor's fandom, they're trying to learn our strategy of v0ting. So please do NOT engage with them and only focus on SEVENTEEN. 

*We worked hard now we need to work harder for our SEVENTEEN.*

If you have more questions regarding str17ming and voting then feel free to comment down below or you can dm me on Twitter or instagram. I'll try my best to help my fellow CARATs out.
Twitter-@ uwu_jeonghan
Instagram- @ zunai. na
Stay hydrated, drink loads of water and stay safe CARATs. Let's give our SEVENTEEN more wins <333

author: @streamseventeen3466
text:
For new carats
SCOUPS (Choi Seungcheol) overall leader, hip hop leader, main rapper- Bright dark blue shirt with silver hair
(Yoon) JEONGHAN lead vocalist- White shirt, light blue jeans, brown hair
JOSHUA (Hong)/ (Hong Ji-soo) lead vocalist- all in grey
JUN (Wen Junhui)/ (Moon Junhui) lead dancer- white shirt with blue stripey thing across it
HOSHI (Kwon Soonyoung) performance leader, main dancer- white shirt with that black cap with straps over the ears - idk what u call it
(Jeon) WONWOO lead rapper- blue and white outfit
WOOZI (Lee Jihoon) producer/composer, lead vocalist, vocal leader- all light blue with Caramel (?)/ lightish brown hair
DK/ DOKYEOM (Lee Seokmin) main vocal- yellow top with blue stripe and brown hair
(Kim) MINGYU Lead rapper- white shirt and black bucket hat
THE8 (Xu Minghao)/ (Seo Myeongho) Lead dancer-grey red outfit with black bucket hat
(Boo) SEUNGKWAN Main vocalist- black top with white square and pinky red hair
(Chwe) VERNON/ (Choi Hansol) Main rapper- black top and beanie
DINO (Lee Chan) Main dancer- white top and blue cap

author: @vwonwoozi
text:
Seventeen are the only group whose choreography/ performance videos I could watch on repeat. 
It’s just so nice to watch, like no matter the concept because they’re all amazing dancers and can express it all very well in their own style, yet being cohesive with the whole group.
ALSO the synergy and synchronicity between them all is just on another level and they never slack off even if they’re not at the front and on top of all that you can just tell how much they enjoy performing and having fun with each other!

Anyway svt keep doing as you are, you’re all doing great and have come so far already. Carats will always support you 💛
Also note Jihoon fluffy hair ^^

text: *I DON'T KNOW WHY I'M CRYING BUT THIS IS SUCH A HEARTWARMING SIGHT TO SEE. THE WAY THEY GENUINELY ENJOY AND HYPE THEIR MEMBERS IN JUST A DANCE PRACTICE VIDEO IS SO SEVENTEEN. THIS IS SEVENTEEN THAT CARATS KNOW, THEY ALWAYS SHOWS THAT THEY REALLY LOVE PERFORMING THIER WORKS FOR THEIR FANS WHILE MAKING THEIR BOND MORE STRONGER AND SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOURNEY. I SWEAR GUYS SEVENTEEN IS THE GROUP THAT WILL LAST LONG IN THIS INDUSTRY. THEY PRIORITIZE THEIR BONDS, THEIR ENJOYMENT EVEN WHEN WORKING HARD, THEIR RELATIONSHIP WITH CARATS, HOW THEY LOOK BACK TO WHERE THEY STARTED BUT NOT STOPPING TILL THEY REACH PAST THEIR GOAL YET THEY AREN'T RUSHING AND JUST KEEPS MAKING MEMORIES ALONG THEIR WAY. SO STAN THIS BOYS, THEY NEVER FAIL US. ONCE YOU STAN THEM YOU WILL JUST SAY THAT "I NEVER REGRET STANNING SEVENTEEN".*

author: @yanyan-pl2uz
text:
2:33 *THE CHOREO IS SO SIMPLE BUT REALLY MEANINGFUL. THE WAY THIS LOOKS LIKE THEY ARE HAVING SO MUCH FUN WHILE CAMPING TOGETHER (IT LOOKS LIKE THEY ARE DOING BONFIRE AND EVERYONE JUST ENJOY THEIR TIME IN THE MOMENT. THE SMILES ON THEIR FACES TELLS EVERYTHING). THEY MIGHT SAY THAT THIS IS JUST PART OF THE CHOREO BUT YOU CAN SEE HOW HAPPY THEY ARE ON THAT PART, THE WAY THIS TELLS THAT SEVENTEEN ALWAYS STICKS TOGETHER NO MATTER WHAT, THEY WILL MAKE MEMORIES WITH EACH OTHER WHILE HAVING FUN. THIS CHOREO IS JUST PURE, SO PURE. WHEN THEY SAY 'HENG:GARAE,  JOURNEY OF YOUTH' THEY NEVER LIE, THIS IS INDEED A JOURNEY OF YOUTH. THE MEANING AND LYRICS OF EVERY SONG IN THE ALBUM JUST PROVE IT. THIS BOYS IS JUST SO WORTH IT TO STAN. THEY ARE NOT JUST TALENTED AND HUMBLE BUT THEY ARE ALSO BUNCH OF SUNSHINES THAT BRINGS SMILE TO EVERY CARAT THAT SUPPORTS THEM (WELL THEY ARE PART TIME COMEDIANS THO. SO EVERYONE WILL NEVER DOUBT THAT STATEMENT).*

author: @hotaru2020
text:
Even without the award, we know that the best dance performance group title was made for them. Every group deserve it but every fandom can agree that Seventeen is the most deserving. Before most idols started partaking in the composition of their songs, Seventeen already does it --- not to impress but because they needed to. And people can't deny, they dance with all their heart on every performance and sing with their soul. They pour their emotions and experiences on the lyrics they write and Woozi and Bumzu and some of the members do their best to give justice to their well-thought words. Hoshi do not simply creates their choreographies, he thoughtfully *innovates* and make sure that the message their songs are trying to show are delivered through their dance moves. Every group is great but no one makes me prouder and happier than these 13 men.

*Seventeen Jjang!*
